message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  I believe this reflects its worth accurately. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm willing to pay a maximum of $12,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  While I value your interest, I'm looking for a price closer to $13,000.  Would you be willing to meet me somewhere in the middle?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Alice. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
